Spaceship is a vehicle that takes people to space.
Deep water over normally dry land is called forest fire.
"homeless" means "having nowhere to live".
The strength of volcanoes is measured in Richter scale.
An advisor is somebody in his last year at school.
A bookseller is somebody who sells flowers.
"formal" is "business like".
"fantastic" and "great" are synonyms.
"Baharat" and "spices" are synonyms.
A suffix usually changes the meaning of a word.
"canned" means "to put in a liquid for a long time".
Sailors are people who work on ships.
Mutiny is when sailors or soldiers refuse to obey orders.
The text is mainly talking about ……….
questionsData.article:
The sun is the largest star in our system. It is a huge star, and the planets orbit around it. The sun is spherical
in shape and the scientists state that it contains a mass of hot plasma. The sun is essential for the earth as it gives
the earth energy which we (require 1) for the existence of life. The sun is said to have the same age as the solar
system. In other words, scientists believe it is four and a half billion years old. The sun basically is a large sphere
that glows because it contains hot gases. The (major 2) gases which make up the sun are hydrogen and helium. In
other words, it has 70% hydrogen and 28% helium. It also contains other gases like carbon, oxygen and nitrogen.
Further, there are other elements like silicon, neon, sulfur and magnesium. The sun is a very bright star (which 3)
is four hundred times brighter than a full moon.
